short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you import a job description from LinkedIn into JobIQ.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a companion extension to your JobIQ account, it allows you to import a job post straight from LinkedIn directly to your account for tracking or to generate a job specific cover letter and resume.

After installing this extension, you will be required to login to your JobIQ account which there after a glowing button will appear every time you navigate to a job post on LinkedIn.

Support for more websites is coming soon.

2024/01/16 Updates
---------------------------------------
- Added button to navigate to your newly created workspace
- Login state is now in sync with htts://jobiq.app
- Added button to go to your JobIQ dashboard
